com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal

Class XTerm8bitIndexedColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.XTerm8bitIndexedColorUtils

  • public class XTerm8bitIndexedColorUtils
extends Object
    This class can help you convert to and from the 8-bit indexed color standard that is supported by some terminal emulators. For details on how this works, please see this commit log message.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Method Detail

      • getClosestColor

        public static int getClosestColor(int red,
                  int green,
                  int blue)
        Given a RGB value, finds the closest color from the 8-bit palette. The calculation is done using distance in three dimensional space so it's not actually 100% accurate (color similarity is a whole research area of its own) but it's a good approximation.
        Parameters:
        red - Red component value (0-255)
        green - Green component value (0-255)
        blue - Blue component value (0-255)
        Returns:
        Index of the closest color

      • getAWTColor

        public static Color getAWTColor(int index)
        Returns the supplied color index as a AWT Color object
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the color (0-255)
        Returns:
        AWT Color object representing the color

      • getAWTColor

        public static Color getAWTColor(int index,
                TerminalPalette terminalPalette)
        Returns the supplied color index as a AWT Color object
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the color (0-255)
        terminalPalette - Palette to use for the initial 16 color values (index 0-15)
        Returns:
        AWT Color object representing the color
